snippet.title: Bugs Bunny Lost In Time Trailer 1999
snippet.description:
Bugs Bunny Lost In Time Trailer 1999

Official Content From Infogrames

Join Bugs as he jumps into a time machine, which scoots him to six different worlds. Each world brings Bugs face-to-face with some of his greatest foes. Collect golden carrots and advance through the different levels. With over 17 levels in each world there will be plenty of action for you and Bugs explore!
Platforms: Sony PlayStation

Sony PlayStation
, Young Children's,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Bugs Bunny Lost In Time
